desc: We’re reinventing the dinner party—one artisan-curated hosting box at a time. Whether you’re looking to dial up date night or take Taco Tuesday up a notch—our Pass the Salsa box upgrades your evenings with all the extras—game-night Q’s and hosting how-to’s included—that make the experience that much more special.

layout.text: Step up date night, invite the neighbors over for drinks, take game night up a notch—we’re creating excuses to safely gather again, one elevated hosting box at a time. You do the food and booze; we take care of the fun stuff.
